title: ECharts sankey series
description: sankey series config. Use in: { series: [{ type: "sankey", ... }] }

nodeGap.description: The vertical distance between two nodes

draggable.description: Control if the node can move or not

layoutIterations.description: The number of iterations to change the position of the node

edgeLabel.description: Props: formatter, show, position, distance, rotate, offset, minMargin, overflow, ellipsis, silent, precision, valueAnimation, rich, color, fontStyle, fontWeight, fontFamily, fontSize, align, verticalAlign, baseline, opacity, lineHeight, backgroundColor, borderColor, borderWidth, borderType, borderDashOffset, borderRadius, padding, width, height, textBorderColor, textBorderWidth, textBorderType, textBorderDashOffset, textShadowBlur, textShadowColor, textShadowOffsetX, textShadowOffsetY, tag, shadowBlur, shadowColor, shadowOffsetX, shadowOffsetY

cursor.description: Cursor when mouse on the elements

dataGroupId.description:
groupId of data. can be used for doing drilldown / up animation
It will be ignored if:
 - groupId is specified in each data
 - encode.itemGroupId is given.

seriesLayoutBy.description:
When dataset is used, seriesLayoutBy specifies whether the column or the row of dataset is mapped to the series
namely, the series is "layout" on columns or rows

labelLine.description: Props: show, showAbove, length, length2, smooth, minTurnAngle, lineStyle

labelLayout.description: Overall label layout option in label layout stage.

stateAnimation.description: Animation config for state transition.. Props: duration, easing, delay

universalTransition.description: If enabled universal transition cross series.

selectedMap.description:
Map of selected data
key is name or index of data.

animationThreshold.description: Disable animation when the number of elements exceeds the threshold

animationDuration.description:
Duration of initialize animation.
Can be a callback to specify duration of each element

animationDelay.description:
Delay of initialize animation
Can be a callback to specify duration of each element

animationDurationUpdate.description:
Delay of data update animation.
Can be a callback to specify duration of each element

animationDelayUpdate.description:
Delay of data update animation.
Can be a callback to specify duration of each element

emphasis.description: Emphasis states. Props: label, itemStyle, lineStyle, focus, blurScope, disabled

select.description: Select states. Props: label, itemStyle, lineStyle, disabled

blur.description: Blur states.. Props: label, itemStyle, lineStyle
